transitionId.description: The ID of the transition. To get the ID, view the workflow in text mode in the Jira admin settings. The ID is shown next to the transition.

key.description: The key of the property being updated, also known as the name of the property. Set this to the same value as the `key` defined in the request body.

workflowName.description: The name of the workflow that the transition belongs to.

workflowMode.description: The workflow status. Set to `live` for inactive workflows or `draft` for draft workflows. Active workflows cannot be edited.

id.description: The ID of the transition property.

b_key.description: The key of the transition property. Also known as the name of the transition property.

value.description: The value of the transition property.
